name: Tree House Builder
description:
Hello Kids and Girls, Have you ever build a Tree house? OXO Apps presents this Tree house maker, Fix it and decorator game in 2017. This is a farm house builder game specially for gardening lovers. Build, Decorate and Design this tree house for little kids & baby with amazing farming and wood cutting skills.

First you have to cut the trees and then collect wood pieces. After that build a complete house and make a farm land tree house. You have to look on instructions and follow them step by step. When its done there are many decorations, add-ons & activities to decorate the home interior. Play and enjoy this crazy tree house builder mania game. You must be enjoyed it.
